summary: AI-driven audio recording/processing app experiencing static/errors in recordings; user requests diagnostic tooling and a fix.
architectural_notes: Add multi-stage audio validation/diagnostics ('triple checking') across capture, processing, and output to isolate where static is introduced.
known_issues: Static/noise appears after audio processing; recording may contain errors/artifacts.

existing_features.title: Implement a "Triple Check" audio diagnostics system that identifies where static/artifacts are introduced by comparing (1) decoded input audio, (2) audio after early pipeline processing, and (3) final processed/encoded output, and surface the results in the UI.
Add pipeline checkpoint support to the in-browser DSP processor so that the audio can be rendered and inspected at multiple stages without changing the user’s chosen DSP settings.
Fix the error(s) that can cause static/artifacts after processing by hardening the decode → DSP → encode path with audio-safety validations and robust resource cleanup.
Expose a user-facing "Diagnostics" section in the Advanced Audio Editor that enables running Triple Check, viewing results, and exporting the report, without requiring backend changes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement a 'triple checking' diagnostic system element to trace where post-processing static/noise is introduced in recordings
Fix the error causing static/noise after processing and recording errors

projectName: Add triple-check audio diagnostics to trace and fix post-processing static in recordings
